title: LeagueClient.exe - Entry Point Not Found
body:
Tried to play League today and this popped up.

"LeagueClient.exe - Entry Point Not Found"

"The procedure entry point ucrtbase.abort could not be located in the dynamic link library api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll"

I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game, troubleshooting, and running it as an administrator. Nothing seems to work. Anyone have any idea whats going on? How to fix it? Anything?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you running any third party software that interfaces with the game at all?
